mapper.select: SELECT c.cat_name catgoryname_cd, sum(ot.item_amount * ot.item_price) salse_p FROM product_tbl p INNER JOIN order_det_tbl ot ON p.pro_num = ot.pro_num INNER JOIN (SELECT c1.cat_name,c2.cat_code FROM category_tbl c1, category_tbl c2 WHERE c2.cat_prtcode = c1.cat_code) c ON p.cat_code = c.cat_code INNER JOIN order_num_tbl o ON o.order_num = ot.order_num AND TO_CHAR(o.order_redate, 'YYYY/MM') = #{ordDate} -- 날짜검색을 위해 작성 GROUP BY c.cat_name,TO_CHAR(o.order_redate, 'YYYY/MM') ORDER BY c.cat_name
mapper.update: UPDATE visitor_log SET user_id = #{user_id}, is_member = 'Y' WHERE session_id = #{session_id} AND is_member = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN is_member = 'Y' THEN '회원' ELSE '비회원' END AS memberType, TO_CHAR(vi_date, 'YYYY/MM') AS visitDateTime, -- 날짜 포함한 형식 EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vi_date) AS month, -- MONTH 필드 추가 COUNT(*) AS count FROM visitor_log WHERE TO_CHAR(vi_date, 'YYYY/MM') = #{UserDate} GROUP BY is_member,TO_CHAR(vi_date, 'YYYY/MM'), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vi_date) ORDER BY visitDateTime
